title: Crash Investigation Expert Weighs In On Flight MH17
teaser: The former chairman of the National Transportation Safety Board discusses the steps that would normally be taken after a plane crash.
contentencoded:
There are still many questions and few answers related to the crash of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 that crashed Thursday, killing all 298 passengers aboard.Â The commercial airliner may have been shot down by a missile along the Russian and Ukraine border.

Jim Hall, former chairman of the National Transportation Safety Board, joins Here & Now’s Meghna Chakrabarti to discuss the steps that would normally be taken after a plane crash.

Guest

  • Jim Hall, former chairman of the National Transportation Safety Board and current president of Hall and Associates.
